name: Turtle Robot
tagline: A blatant rip off the board game "Robot Turtles", but single player.
body:
### Why play?
A way for a child to practice what they learn in Robot Turtles without a parent being around.

### Where to play
Play on [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.Featherly.Shawn.TurtleRobot)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
